# USE HIGH-POWERED ABILITIES üí•
Unleash the power of 6 unique heroes and master 18 epic abilities, including drone piloting, portal teleportation, and grappling hooks.
{440543928908440}

# MASTER THE MOVEMENT SYSTEM üí®
Experience next-level movement with wall runs, wall bounces, and infinite slides.
{964672438686645}

# EXPLORE A GIGANTIC MAP üó∫Ô∏è
Explore a massive and wild environment of 1.5 square mile (4km¬≤). Fight up to 39 players.
{791130333148631}

# FIGHT WITH POWERFUL WEAPONS üî´
Arm yourself with 9 powerful sci-fi weapons and 6 types of grenades, all with realistic physics.
{1135254451031064}

# SURVIVE THE ARENA ‚öîÔ∏è
Battle in the arena (gulag) for a thrilling second chance to rejoin the match.
{1524544925154847}

# PILOT VEHICLES üõ∏
Speed through the game with fast, physics-based vehicles like the dropship or the hoverbike.
{781170470826206}


# YOU ARE THE NEW CHAMPION üèÜ
Celebrate your victories with friends as your opponents bow to your supremacy.
{1011730990316459}



The most ruthless fighters in the galaxy are joining the battle royale.
Some fight for glory, some for money, while others are only interested in revenge. But in the end, the only thing that matters is survival.


Do you have what it takes to become the next champion of Atlas Endgames?

Atlas Endgames is in early development but aims to become the ultimate next-gen battle royale experience. The game is receiving constant updates.

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/BK5FUz5tGr
